article.headline: Weber State 83, Portland State 73
article.story: PORTLAND, Ore. (AP) -- Ryan McCarthy scored 27 points, including 6-of 7 from 3-point range, and Derek Olich added 13 as Northwest Nazarene defeated Portland State 75-73 in an exhibition Friday. Daniel Nyom took a pass from Olich under the basket with 2.5 second left and scored the winning basket for the Division II Crusaders. Seamus Boxley led Portland State with 17 points and grabbed six rebounds. Will Funn added 15 points for the Vikings. Northwest Nazarene led most of the game. The Crusaders held a 14-point advantage with just under six minutes to go before Portland State went on a 10-0 run to close the gap to 70-66. The Vikings scored five points in the final minute, including two free throws from Funn with 11 seconds remaining, before Nyom hit the game-winning layup.
